== Detection and removal ==
== Detection and removal ==
â
Microsoft releases an update of its Malicious Software Removal Tool every month,<ref name="microsoft-2">{{citation|title = Malicious Software Removal Tool|url = http://www.microsoft.com/security/malwareremove/default.mspx|publisher = [[Microsoft]]|date = 2009-04-14|accessdate = 2009-05-02}}</ref> which it recommends for the detection and removal of rogue security software. On systems where installation of the tool is blocked by malware, an online scanning service is also provided.<ref name="microsoft-3">{{citation|title = Beware of rogue security software|url = http://www.microsoft.com/protect/computer/viruses/rogue.mspx|date = 2009-04-09|publisher = [[Microsoft]]|accessdate = 2009-05-02}}</ref><ref name="microsoft-5">{{cite web|title = Windows Live OneCare safety scanner|url = http://onecare.live.com/site/en-us/default.htm?s_cid=sah/?s_cid=sah|publisher = [[Microsoft]]|work = [[Windows Live]]|accessdate = 2009-05-02}}</ref>
+
Microsoft releases an update of its Malicious Software Removal Tool every month,<ref name="microsoft-2">{{citation|title = Malicious Software Removal Tool|url = http://www.microsoft.com/security/malwareremove/default.mspx|publisher = [[Microsoft]]|date = 2009-04-14|accessdate = 2009-05-02}}</ref> which it recommends for the detection and removal of rogue security software. On systems where installation of the tool is blocked by malware, an online scanning service is also provided.<ref name="microsoft-3">{{citation|title = Beware of rogue security software|url = http://www.microsoft.com/protect/computer/viruses/rogue.mspx|date = 2009-04-09|publisher = [[Microsoft]]|accessdate = 2009-05-02}}</ref><ref name="microsoft-5">{{cite web|title = Windows Live OneCare safety scanner|url = http://onecare.live.com/site/en-us/default.htm?s_cid=sah/?s_cid=sah|publisher = [[Microsoft]]|work = [[Windows Live]]|accessdate = 2009-05-02}}</ref>. There is also [[Microsoft Security Essentials]], a tools that detects and prevents malware.
